helio.materialiser.mappings

Class WoTTranslator

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.mappings.WoTTranslator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MappingTranslator

    public class WoTTranslator
extends java.lang.Object
implements MappingTranslator
    This class implements a MappingTranslator that translates WoT mappings into a valid HelioMaterialiserMapping
    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

        public HelioMaterialiserMapping translate(java.lang.String arg0)
                                   throws MalformedMappingException
        Description copied from interface: MappingTranslator
